title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Willow Duvet Cover Collection at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: Transform your bedroom into a modern and sophisticated haven with the Willow duvet cover by Kenneth Cole Reaction Home. It features bold, criss-crossing strokes of black on a crème color jacquard ground that combine for a chic presentation. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/Kenneth-Cole-Reaction-Home-Willow-Duvet-Cover/210114?
Transform your bedroom into a modern and sophisticated haven with the Willow duvet cover by Kenneth Cole Reaction Home. It features bold, criss-crossing strokes of black on a crème color jacquard ground that combine for a chic presentation. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: The Willow duvet cover and bedding collection by Kenneth Cole reaction home was designed exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond. The first layer of the bed begins with a snow white sateen sheet set featuring and embroidered Baroda stitch in warm tones at the hem of the sheet and the pillow sham, adding a subtle dressmakers detail. The euro shams add an ideal backdrop to the bed. They are metallic printed cotton, with a cotton velvet reverse. the willow duvet covers and pillow shams are cotton sateen jacquard with a bold overlapping linear printed pattern. The coordinating pillow shams are finished with the same linear pattern as the duvet cover. The resulting bed is modern and sophisticated. The decorative pillows accenting this bed's suites are a metallic faux leather applique pillow, a puttered distressed faux leather pillow, and a cotton printed pillow with a lustrous shimmer. The pillows add the key fashion element to complete this bed look. The Willow duvet cover and bedding is part of the Kenneth Cole reaction home collection, it is available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
